Warn if individual file size exceeds this threshold (bytes)
Warn if number of files exceeds this threshold

manifest.settings.safety.max-processing-: Warn if estimated processing time exceeds this threshold (milliseconds)
runtime.tooltip.out-of-sync: Files out of sync - click for details
runtime.tooltip.error: Error checking files - click for settings
runtime.message.need-two-files: Select at least 2 files to compare
runtime.message.missing-keys: Some files missing keys. See status bar.
runtime.message.parse-errors: Some files parse failed. See status bar.
runtime.message.template-cleared: Template cleared. Back to auto compare.
runtime.message.all-ignored-cleared: Ignored list cleared. All files checked.
runtime.help.title: EnvSync-LE Help
runtime.help.quick-start:
1. Open workspace with multiple .env files
2. Run "EnvSync-LE: Show Issues" (Ctrl+Alt+E)
3. Review detected inconsistencies and fix them
runtime.help.commands:
**Show Issues**: Display sync problems
**Compare Files**: Compare two .env files
**Set Template**: Mark file as reference
**Ignore File**: Exclude from sync checking
**Settings**: Configure options
runtime.help.formats:
**Detects**: Missing variables, extra variables, out-of-sync sets
**Template system**: Use one .env file as source of truth
**Ignore system**: Exclude files from checking
runtime.help.troubleshooting:
**No issues detected?** Ensure multiple .env files exist
**Template not working?** Verify template is set correctly
**Files not detected?** Check file naming (.env prefix required)
**Need help?** Check Output panel for details
runtime.help.settings:
Access via Command Palette: "EnvSync-LE: Open Settings"
Key settings: Auto-detect, status bar, notification levels, file patterns
